title: Google\Cloud\Dialogflow\V2\MessageAnnotation
name: MessageAnnotation
description:
Represents the result of annotation for the message.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dialogflow.v2.MessageAnnotation

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.parts
params.description: The collection of annotated message parts ordered by their position in the message. You can recover the annotated message by concatenating [AnnotatedMessagePart.text].

params.name: data.contain_entities
params.description: Indicates whether the text message contains entities.
